com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id

Class IdsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id.AbstractIds
      • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id.IdsBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentIdentifiers, Ids, IndexingIdentifiers, QueryIdentifiers, Iterable<Id>

    public class IdsBuilder
extends AbstractIds
    A builder class for aggregating multiple ids into a single object.

      • IdsBuilder

        public IdsBuilder(Iterable<?>... ids)
        Creates an IdsBuilder with the specified ids. The Iterable can contain instances of Number or Id. Note that all instances of Ids are suitable iterables.
        Parameters:
        ids - The initial ids

      • from

        public static IdsBuilder from(Iterable<?> ids)
        Converts an iterable of ids into an IdsBuilder. This method can be more efficient than using the equivalent constructor but the returned object might be backed by the object provided.
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids to convert
        Returns:
        An equivalent instance of IdsBuilder
